sentences.en: Good lord , you're really a deft hand.
He is a very deft novelist too, with a superb ear for dialogue.
sentences.cn: 他同时也是一名才思敏捷的小说家，很善于搜集对话方面的素材。

sentences.en: He met them all blandly, becoming deft in excuse.
sentences.cn: 他和气地对付所有的这些人, 在找借口推托上变得很熟练了.

sentences.en: He sketched her with quick, deft strokes.
sentences.cn: 他给她画素描，下笔又快又熟练。

sentences.en: He was beside her quickly and his deft fingers untied the wide bow under her chin.
sentences.cn: 他即刻站到了她身边,用熟练的手指把她下巴底下的结带解开.

sentences.en: He was not in fact an old man but a deft young one.
sentences.cn: 叫他老梁,其实是个青年人,举动很精细.

sentences.en: It was going to take some deft political footwork to save the situation.
sentences.cn: 当时得采取一些巧妙的政治手段以挽回局势。

sentences.en: It was very deft of him to say that before you could react.
sentences.cn: 你还来不及反应他就那样说,真是手法高明.

sentences.en: She is a deft hand with a needle.
She is deft at dealing with reporters.
She was knitting with deft fingers.
sentences.cn: 她用灵巧的手指编结着.

sentences.en: The director employs sensuous, atmospheric camerawork and deft dramatic touches.
sentences.cn: 导演在镜头运用上既富有美感又渲染了气氛，戏剧手法的运用也娴熟自如。

sentences.en: This bird, sharp of eye and deft of beak, can accurately peck the flying insects in the air.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟眼疾嘴快, 能准确地把空中的飞虫啄住.

sentences.en: With deft fingers and a quick lick, he rolled a thin cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他手指敏捷,飞快地一舔, 就卷好一支细细的香烟.

sentences.en: With deft fingers she untangled the wire.
sentences.cn: 她用灵巧的手指解开了金属线.

trans.tran_en: a deft movement is skilful, and often quick
